title: Pleasant Valley Time Trial Training Series
The New Britain Crit, presented by Anthem Rewards
Cog WIld / Rock n'  Road Cycles Fall Century
description: Recreational/Training 100 Mile ride (60 Mile option also avaiable)
course: Route begins and ends at Rock n\' Road Cycles in Westbrook CT.  Course winds through the lower CT River Valley and Eastern CT
registration: Pre-registration will be avaible on Bikereg.com, Rock n\' Road Cycles as well as day of event registration
directions: From All Points: Interstate 95 to Exit 65. Follow RT 153 South 1/2 Mile to RT 1 (Boston Post Road) Left on RT 1.  Rock N\'Road Cyles is a 1/2 mile on left.
